titles.title: To amend the Animal Health Protection Act to exempt certain animal identification information from disclosure under the Freedom of Information Act.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock and Horticulture.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 3/10/2005--Introduced. Amends the Animal Health Protection Act to exempt certain animal identification information from disclosure under the Freedom of Information Act. Sets forth discretionary and mandatory limited disclosure provisions.
